title: Kundan Polki Adavari Jhumka - A Touch of Telugu Heritage
features: Intricate Kundan setting with Polki diamonds at the center, surrounded by petite emerald petals. The petal design is characteristic of the Adavari style, and the Hyderabadi polish gives it a rich, antique luster.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian occasions such as weddings
and festivals (pandagalu). Also suitable for parties where you want to make a statement.
description: This Jhumka embodies the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad. The Kundan Polki setting is a traditional technique passed down through generations, and the emeralds add a touch of royalty. It's a valuable heirloom piece that will be cherished for years to come. The unique Adavari design makes it a rare find.
